column5: What a battle! Fitch is tough. St Pierre is tougher!!

I'm watching the replay as well.  St. Pierre is a giant.  My brother is a professional fighter and I have had the opportunity to meet and dine with St. Pierre.  The dude has the widest shoulders I have ever seen.  So big for 170 pounds.  Super nice guy too!
And, he is an accomplished hockey player as well. That is something that you actually got to meet him and break bread. By the way, what did you guys eat?
Awesome fight and Fitch took some heavy hits Pierre left his whole face swollen, So looks like BJ Penn is next up to bat.
He had pasta ... my brother and a shared a bunch of wings haha
